Text: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3551572 is the address of the other 2 episodes if you forgot. Hopefully you didn't delete the shows. homerungus is the only person that deserves any of these shows. tell him thanks.

Thanks for the new eps. Awesome!
Currently seeding Eps 13&14 again if anyone's interested.

It's extreme it's proper extreme! :-)
Thanks- I haven't had an opportunity to do this until the weekend. Sorry you're feeling put out that people aren't grateful. I really am!

jazmyne, i'm getting the episodes from IRC, and i keep getting disconnected. It's taking me a lot of time to get them. So when I see that the previous two episodes were downloaded 13 times, and i personally had to do 10 of them, and at the time no one else is seeding, it upsets me. I see that some people are wising up though and seeding and I appreciate it. hopefully it keeps going, because that means that i can upload the new episodes faster since i have more bandwidth available. thanks for your comments and gratitude! i hope you enjoy.
18 thru 20 is up... keep seeding what you have... http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3557071

http://geekstuff.paulbain.co.uk/uknova-signup-now/

Go there and sign up for UK Nova. That's the tracker that has all the new shipwrecked episodes for the fifth season. New episodes are uploaded every sunday night.
